conclusion: Determine the induced EMF using Faraday's law of electromagnetic induction.
Magnetic flux is given by Phi = B * S.
Magnetic field B varies linearly from 0.2 T to 0.4 T over a time interval of 4 seconds.
Rate of change of magnetic field dB/dt is 0.05 T/s.
Induced EMF is calculated as -10 V.
Total resistance in the circuit is the sum of internal resistance of the coil and external resistance.
Current I in the circuit is approximately 0.167 A.
Power consumed by resistor R is given by P = I^2 * R.
Power consumed by R is approximately 1.39 W.
The maximum power consumed by the resistor R is 1.39 W.
